info.name: mouse events
info.description:
left circle : show mouse down event
middle circle : show mouse up event 
right circle : show bi-click event
( just click anywhere )

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define T(U) texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(U), 0 )

#define mouse_down     ( T(1).x > 0. ) 
#define mouse_up       ( T(1).y > 0. ) 
#define mouse_biclick  ( T(1).z > 0. ) 

#define BICLICK_DELAY   .3
